title: Explainable Survival: From Prediction to Trust in Hex
one_liner: Local modeling, error analysis, and explainability work supporting an interactive, explainable ML app built in Hex.
problem: Just predicting survival on the Titanic dataset doesn't generate explainable results.
approach: This project reframes the classic Titanic survival prediction problem as a trust, error analysis, and interpretability challenge, rather than a leaderboard optimization task.
tradeoffs: This project was not about producing a Titanic leaderboard 'winner'.
